quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

quotes.author: Harold Abelson
quotes.quote: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.

quotes.author: Thomas F. O'Connell
quotes.quote: The best error message is the one that never shows up.

quotes.author: Rich Hickey
quotes.quote: Programming is not about typing, it's about thinking.

quotes.author: Alan Kay
quotes.quote: The most disastrous thing that you can ever learn is your first programming language.

quotes.author: Grady Booch
quotes.quote: The function of good software is to make the complex appear to be simple.

quotes.author: Andrew Hunt and David Thomas
quotes.quote: It's not at all important to get it right the first time. It's vitally important to get it right the last time.

quotes.author: Guido van Rossum
quotes.quote: The joy of coding Python should be in seeing short, concise, readable classes that express a lot of action in a small amount of clear code.

quotes.author: Cory House
quotes.quote: Coding is like cooking. Most of the time is spent in preparation; the actual cooking takes very little time.

quotes.author: Marijn Haverbeke
quotes.quote: The art of programming is the skill of controlling complexity.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: It's easier to ask forgiveness than it is to get permission.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.

quotes.author: Donald Knuth
quotes.quote: Premature optimization is the root of all evil.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.

quotes.author: Ada Lovelace
quotes.quote: I never am really satisfied that I understand anything; because, understand it well as I may, my comprehension can only be an infinitesimal fraction of all I want to understand about the many connections and relations which occur to me.

quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup
quotes.quote: The best way to prepare is to write programs, and to study great programs that other people have written. In my case, I went to the garbage cans at the Computer Science Center and fished out listings of their operating system.

quotes.author: Margaret Hamilton
quotes.quote: The nice thing about standards is that you have so many to choose from.

quotes.author: Alan Turing
quotes.quote: Sometimes it is the people no one can imagine anything of who do the things no one can imagine.

quotes.author: Grace Murray Hopper
quotes.quote: The most damaging phrase in the language is: 'It's always been done that way.'

quotes.author: John Carmack
quotes.quote: Focus is saying no to 1,000 good ideas.

quotes.author: Larry Wall
quotes.quote: The three chief virtues of a programmer are: Laziness, Impatience, and Hubris.

quotes.author: Douglas Adams
quotes.quote: I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.

quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra
quotes.quote: Simplicity is a great virtue but it requires hard work to achieve it and education to appreciate it. And to make matters worse: complexity sells better.

quotes.author: Steve McConnell
quotes.quote: Good code is its own best documentation. As you're about to add a comment, ask yourself, 'How can I improve the code so that this comment isn't needed?'

quotes.author: Ada Lovelace
quotes.quote: The Analytical Engine weaves algebraic patterns, just as the Jacquard loom weaves flowers and leaves.

quotes.author: Niklaus Wirth
quotes.quote: Software is getting slower more rapidly than hardware becomes faster.

quotes.author: Donald Knuth
quotes.quote: It is much more rewarding to do more with less.

quotes.author: Yukihiro Matsumoto
quotes.quote: The goal of Ruby is to make programmers happy.

quotes.author: Larry Page
quotes.quote: You don't need to have a 100-person company to develop that idea.

quotes.author: Alan Perlis
quotes.quote: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming is not worth knowing.

quotes.author: Kernighan and Plauger
quotes.quote: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it.

quotes.author: Margaret Hamilton
quotes.quote: There was no choice but to be pioneers; no time to be beginners.

quotes.author: Chris Heilmann
quotes.quote: Java is to JavaScript what car is to carpet.

quotes.author: Jeff Atwood
quotes.quote: The best code is no code at all.

quotes.author: John McCarthy
quotes.quote: He who refuses to do arithmetic is doomed to talk nonsense.

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.quote: It is not enough for code to work.

quotes.author: Alan Turing
quotes.quote: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: If you are born poor it's not your mistake, but if you die poor it's your mistake.

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: I'm an egotistical bastard, and I name all my projects after myself.

quotes.author: Paul Graham
quotes.quote: It's hard to do a really good job on anything you don't think about in the shower.

quotes.author: Alan Kay
quotes.quote: If you can't solve a problem, then there is an easier problem you can solve: find it.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: A ship in port is safe, but that's not what ships are built for.

quotes.author: Richard Stallman
quotes.quote: I could have made money this way, and perhaps amused myself writing code. But I knew that at the end of my career, I would look back on years of building walls to divide people, and feel I had spent my life making the world a worse place.

quotes.author: Larry Wall
quotes.quote: The three great virtues of a programmer: Laziness, Impatience, and Hubris.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup
quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of languages: the ones people complain about and the ones nobody uses.

quotes.author: Alan Turing
quotes.quote: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.

quotes.author: John McCarthy
quotes.quote: He who refuses to do arithmetic is doomed to talk nonsense.

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.quote: It is not enough for code to work.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: If something is important enough, even if the odds are stacked against you, you should still do it.

quotes.author: Chris Heilmann
quotes.quote: Java is to JavaScript what car is to carpet.

quotes.author: Jeff Atwood
quotes.quote: The best code is no code at all.

quotes.author: John Carmack
quotes.quote: Focus is saying no to 1,000 good ideas.

quotes.author: Margaret Hamilton
quotes.quote: There was no choice but to be pioneers; no time to be beginners.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: The most damaging phrase in the language is: 'It's always been done that way.'

quotes.author: Donald Knuth
quotes.quote: It is much more rewarding to do more with less.

quotes.author: Yukihiro Matsumoto
quotes.quote: The goal of Ruby is to make programmers happy.

quotes.author: Larry Page
quotes.quote: You don't need to have a 100-person company to develop that idea.

quotes.author: Alan Perlis
quotes.quote: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming is not worth knowing.

quotes.author: Kernighan and Plauger
quotes.quote: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it.

quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra
quotes.quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: It's fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.

quotes.author: Brian Kernighan
quotes.quote: Controlling complexity is the essence of computer programming.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: A ship in port is safe, but that's not what ships are built for.

quotes.author: Jeff Bezos
quotes.quote: If you double the number of experiments you do per year, you're going to double your inventiveness.

quotes.author: Larry Wall
quotes.quote: Easy things should be easy and hard things should be possible.

quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.

quotes.author: Peter Norvig
quotes.quote: The best error message is the one that never shows up.

quotes.author: Richard Feynman
quotes.quote: What I cannot create, I do not understand.

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

quotes.author: John Carmack
quotes.quote: In software, we rarely have meaningful requirements. Even if we do, the only measure of success that matters is whether our solution solves the customer's shifting idea of what their problem is.

quotes.author: Ken Thompson
quotes.quote: One of my most productive days was throwing away 1,000 lines of code.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

quotes.author: John von Neumann
quotes.quote: In mathematics, you don't understand things. You just get used to them.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: It is often easier to ask for forgiveness than to ask for permission.

quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra
quotes.quote: Computer science is no more about computers than astronomy is about telescopes.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Great things in business are never done by one person; they're done by a team of people.

quotes.author: Larry Wall
quotes.quote: Good programmers use their brains, but good guidelines save us having to think out every case.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: To me programming is more than an important practical art. It is also a gigantic undertaking in the foundations of knowledge.

quotes.author: Alan Turing
quotes.quote: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: I am not a visionary. I do not have big, grandiose plans.

quotes.author: Marissa Mayer
quotes.quote: I always did something I was a little not ready to do. I think that’s how you grow.

quotes.author: Donald Knuth
quotes.quote: Science is what we understand well enough to explain to a computer. Art is everything else we do.

quotes.author: Jeff Bezos
quotes.quote: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.

quotes.author: Ada Lovelace
quotes.quote: The more I study, the more insatiable do I feel my genius for it to be.

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.quote: The only way to go fast, is to go well.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: The first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency. The second is that automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.

quotes.author: John Carmack
quotes.quote: Story in a game is like a story in a porn movie. It's expected to be there, but it's not that important.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: If you’re trying to create a company, it’s like baking a cake. You have to have all the ingredients in the right proportion.

quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of languages: the ones people complain about and the ones nobody uses.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: If it's a good idea, go ahead and do it. It's much easier to apologize than it is to get permission.

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: I like offending people because I think people who get offended should be offended.

quotes.author: Ada Lovelace
quotes.quote: That brain of mine is something more than merely mortal; as time will show.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: I’ve always been more interested in the future than in the past.

quotes.author: Alan Turing
quotes.quote: Sometimes it is the people no one can imagine anything of who do the things no one can imagine.

quotes.author: Steve Wozniak
quotes.quote: Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: The Internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow.

quotes.author: Larry Wall
quotes.quote: The three chief virtues of a programmer are: Laziness, Impatience, and Hubris.

quotes.author: Ada Lovelace
quotes.quote: If you can't give me poetry, can't you give me poetical science?

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: The most important thing I’ve accomplished, other than building the compiler, is training young people.

quotes.author: John von Neumann
quotes.quote: The sciences do not try to explain, they hardly even try to interpret, they mainly make models.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: I think it is possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: You don't manage people, you manage things. You lead people.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: I never think of the future. It comes soon enough.

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: Software is like sex: it's better when it's free.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: It's easier to ask forgiveness than it is to get permission.

quotes.author: Larry Page
quotes.quote: If you're not doing some things that are crazy, then you're doing the wrong things.

quotes.author: Alan Turing
quotes.quote: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.

quotes.author: Marissa Mayer
quotes.quote: I always did something I was a little not ready to do. I think that’s how you grow.

quotes.author: Ada Lovelace
quotes.quote: The more I study, the more insatiable do I feel my genius for it to be.

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.quote: The only way to go fast, is to go well.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: A ship in port is safe, but that's not what ships are built for.

quotes.author: Chris Heilmann
quotes.quote: Java is to JavaScript what car is to carpet.

quotes.author: Jeff Atwood
quotes.quote: The best code is no code at all.

quotes.author: John Carmack
quotes.quote: Focus is saying no to 1,000 good ideas.

quotes.author: Margaret Hamilton
quotes.quote: There was no choice but to be pioneers; no time to be beginners.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: The most damaging phrase in the language is: 'It's always been done that way.'

quotes.author: Donald Knuth
quotes.quote: It is much more rewarding to do more with less.

quotes.author: Yukihiro Matsumoto
quotes.quote: The goal of Ruby is to make programmers happy.

quotes.author: Larry Page
quotes.quote: You don't need to have a 100-person company to develop that idea.

quotes.author: Alan Perlis
quotes.quote: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming is not worth knowing.

quotes.author: Kernighan and Plauger
quotes.quote: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it.

quotes.author: Margaret Hamilton
quotes.quote: The software needed to be designed for humans, not machines.

quotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup
quotes.quote: There are only two kinds of languages: the ones people complain about and the ones nobody uses.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: If it's a good idea, go ahead and do it. It's much easier to apologize than it is to get permission.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: The first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency. The second is that automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.

quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra
quotes.quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.

quotes.author: Alan Perlis
quotes.quote: A language that doesn't affect the way you think about programming is not worth knowing.

quotes.author: Kernighan and Plauger
quotes.quote: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it.

quotes.author: Margaret Hamilton

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: If it's a good idea, go ahead and do it. It's much easier to apologize than it is to get permission.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: The first rule of any technology used in a business is that automation applied to an efficient operation will magnify the efficiency. The second is that automation applied to an inefficient operation will magnify the inefficiency.

quotes.author: John Carmack
quotes.quote: Story in a game is like a story in a porn movie. It's expected to be there, but it's not that important.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: The function of good software is to make the complex appear to be simple.

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: I'm doing a (free) operating system (just a hobby, won't be big and professional like GNU).

quotes.author: Ada Lovelace
quotes.quote: I never am really satisfied that I understand anything; because, understand it well as I may, my comprehension can only be an infinitesimal fraction of all I want to understand about the many connections and relations which occur to me.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: You manage things; you lead people.

quotes.author: John Carmack
quotes.quote: In software, we rarely have meaningful requirements. Even if we do, the only measure of success that matters is whether our solution solves the customer's shifting idea of what their problem is.

quotes.author: Ken Thompson
quotes.quote: One of my most productive days was throwing away 1,000 lines of code.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Great things in business are never done by one person; they're done by a team of people.

quotes.author: Larry Wall
quotes.quote: Good programmers use their brains, but good guidelines save us having to think out every case.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: The only source of knowledge is experience.

quotes.author: Grace Hopper
quotes.quote: To me programming is more than an important practical art. It is also a gigantic undertaking in the foundations of knowledge.

quotes.author: Alan Turing
quotes.quote: We can only see a short distance ahead, but we can see plenty there that needs to be done.

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: I am not a visionary. I do not have big, grandiose plans.

quotes.author: Marissa Mayer
quotes.quote: I always did something I was a little not ready to do. I think that’s how you grow.

quotes.author: Donald Knuth
quotes.quote: Science is what we understand well enough to explain to a computer. Art is everything else we do.

quotes.author: Jeff Bezos
quotes.quote: A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.
